properties.entry:
INSERT INTO CLASS ( CL_NO ,USER_NO ,CL_CATEGORY ,CL_TITLE ,CL_SUBTITLE ,CL_INFO ,CL_CURRI ,CL_PRICE ,CL_ENROLLDATE ,CL_GRANT ,CL_THUMBNAILPATH
) VALUES ( SEQ_CL ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? )
SELECT CL_NO ,CL_CATEGORY ,CL_TITLE ,CL_ENROLLDATE ,CL_GRANT FROM CLASS WHERE USER_NO = ?
select count(vod_no) vod_count from vod where cl_no = ?
insert into vod values( SEQ_VOD.nextval, ?, ?, ?, default, default )
